name: Vestal Goodman
description: '''Vestal Goodman''' (December 13, 1929 – December 27, 2003) was a singer who performed in the [[Southern gospel]] genre for more than half a century. She was known for her work as a solo performer and as a member of the [[Happy Goodman Family]]—which originated with her husband and his brothers and sisters—one of the pioneering groups in southern gospel music.
